lead_paragraph: The United States is facing massive mandatory cuts on March 1. But it is not hard to devise a feasible alternative, if irrational politics are put aside.

byline.original: By ALBERT R. HUNT | BLOOMBERG NEWS

headline.main: A Sensible Deal Can Avert a 'Sequester' Disaster
headline.print_headline: A Sensible Deal Can Avert a 'Sequester' Disaster

snippet: The United States is facing massive mandatory cuts on March 1. But it is not hard to devise a feasible alternative, if irrational politics are put aside....
